emblcmci.seg
Class NucSegRitsukoProject

java.lang.Object
  emblcmci.seg.NucSegRitsukoProject

public class NucSegRitsukoProject
extends java.lang.Object

First do Gaussblurring with a large sigma value to estimate Otsu threshold value. Second, do Gauss blurring with the original image with a small sigma value, and using the threshold value estimated in the first blurring trial to segment the second image. The macro below reimplemented as a class. 20130319 Kota Miura

Author:
miura
